::Zardus/Striker::

Zardus lands next to the new pod, his scanners reporting that the protofor 
was still inside. He looks at the wolves around the pod and blasts one of 
them in the chest before turning back to the pod.

"Zergling," he says into his comm-link, "Please help me carry this pod back 
to base," he says in a polite but evil tone.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Striker shruggs. "Might as well." he says, flying off after Sniper.
